title: Co dalej z pandemią COVID-19?
description:
Kup moją nową książkę!
📚📚📚 7 CZĄSTECZEK 📚📚📚 
wejdź na https://siedem.alt.pl

Na początku 2020 roku wybuchła pandemia nowej choroby. Tkwimy w tym stanie już trzy lata i czas najwyższy na poważnie zastanowić się - co dalej z koronawirusem.

Materiał o witaminie C:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9CS4KYxpc4g

👉 Patronite ► https://patronite.pl/NaukowyBelkot

===
Źródła (wybrane):

A. Khan - The Next Pandemic
G. Kolata - Flu
J. Barry - The Great Influenza
D. Quammen - Spilover

A. Telenti i in. - After the pandemic: perspectives on the future trajectory of COVID-19
D. Durrheim - Measles eradication—retreating is not an option
N. Shahhosseini i in. - SARS-CoV-2 spillover transmission due to recombination event
G. Kampf i in. - Potential sources, modes of transmission and effectiveness of prevention measures against SARS-CoV-2
S. Salajegheh Tazerji i in. - Transmission of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) to animals: an updated review
S. A. Kemp i in. - SARS-CoV-2 evolution during treatment of chronic infection
S. A. Goldstein i in. - Extensive recombination-driven coronavirus diversification expands the pool of potential pandemic pathogens
H. Brussow i in. - Clinical evidence that the pandemic from 1889 to 1891 commonly called the Russian flu might have been an earlier coronavirus pandemic
E. Clinton Smith i in. - Thinking Outside the Triangle: Replication Fidelity of the Largest RNA Viruses
J. Geoghegan i in. - The phylogenomics of evolving virus virulence

https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/70/wr/mm7034e2.htm
